content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for coming, Aziz. I understand that you are interested in the apartment, but I must inform you that we have already entered into an agreement with another tenant. Therefore, I am sorry to say that the apartment is no longer available for rent. Please let me know if you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I see, thank you for informing me. Is there any other apartment available for rent in Munich?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Yes, we have several other apartments available for rent in Munich. I would be happy to provide you with more information about them if you are interested. Please let me know what your requirements are and I will do my best to find the perfect apartment for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Great, can you give me some details about the apartments?

1. Size: 20 square meters
Rental price: 650 Euros per month
2. Size: 25 square meters
Rental price: 700 Euros per month
3. Size: 30 square meters
Rental price: 750 Euros per month
4. Size: 35 square meters
Rental price: 800 Euros per month
5. Size: 40 square meters
Rental price: 850 Euros per month

Please let me know which one you prefer and I will arrange a viewing for you.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Certainly, Aziz. I have provided you with details about five apartments available for rent in Munich. Please let me know which one you are interested in and I will arrange a viewing for you. If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
